documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Find in-depth information about Next.js features and API.

learn.title: Learn
learn.description: Learn about Next.js in an interactive course with quizzes!

examples.title: Examples
examples.description: Discover and deploy boilerplate example Next.js projects.

deploy.title: Deploy
deploy.description: Instantly deploy your Next.js site to a public URL with Vercel.

sign.title: Sign
sign.description: Trigger signing a message with your wallet to authenticate off-chain operations.

send.title: Send
send.description: Trigger a send transaction to easily send funds to another wallet.

error.invalidInput: It seems that the action was badly requested. Please contact an administrator if the problem persists.
error.resourceNotFound: It seems that the smart contract was not found. Please contact an administrator if the problem persist.
error.resourceUnavailable: It seems that the smart contract is unavailable. Please contact an administrator if the problem persists.
error.transactionRejected: The transaction was rejected. Please check your wallet balance and try again.
error.methodNotSupported: It seems that the requested action is not supported by the smart contract. Please contact an administrator if the problem persists.
error.limitExceeded: The contract receives too many requests at the moment. Please try again later.
error.jsonVersionNotSupported: It seems the provider is not up to date. Please contact an administrator if the problem persists.
error.invalidRequest: It seems the data provided is invalid. Please contact an administrator if the problem persists.
error.methodNotFound: It seems that the requested action does not exist on the smart contract. Please contact an administrator if the problem persists.
error.invalidParams: It seems that the requested action receives the wrong data. Please contact administrator if the problem persists.
error.internalError: There was an internal error. Please contact an administrator if the problem persists.
error.parseError: It seems that the requested action receives the invalid data. Please contact an administrator if the problem persists.
error.userRejectedRequest: The action was canceled by the user.
error.unauthorized: It seems that you are not authorized to perform this action. Please connect your wallet and try again.
error.unsupportedMethod: It seems that your wallet provider does not support this action. Please connect trough another provider and try again.
error.disconnected: It seems you are not connected. Please connect a wallet and try again.
error.chainDisconnected: It seems you are connected to the wrong network. Please connect to the correct network and try again.
